post:
Host Mayo is affordable [SSD Web Hosting](https://hostmayo.com/web-hosting.php) provider since 2015. 

* All our web hosting plans come loaded with following features:
*  Multi PHP
*  Cloudflare
*  Servers in USA
*  Pure SSD storage
*  Whitelabel Hosting
*  99% Uptime Guarantee
*  Private Name Servers
*  Free cPanel Migration
*  24/7 Technical Support
*  Latest cPanel with CloudLinux
*  Softaculous - Automatic WordPress Installation

**Discount Offer!!**
Enjoy 50% Recurring discount using Promotional Code: **extreme** (Use the coupon on checkout page.)
All prices are mentioned below using 50% off coupon.
